slots.description:
During the guided tour we'll discover Central Europe's largest open air railway museum in about 45 minutes. We'll learn about Hungary's remarkable railway history as well as picking up interesting technical information about the steam age and the exciting buildings and equipements designed for the locomotives. Stay tuned to experience the classic steel masterpieces from a gone by era of engineering.
